code: import{v4 as uuidv4}from"uuid";import{PORT}from"../../utils/dataUtils";import add from"../../assets/logo/add-product.svg";import Alert from"../../assets/logo/see-more.svg";import"./YesSensitivity.scss";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function YesSensitivity(_ref){var addProductSensitivity=_ref.addProductSensitivity,products=_ref.products,toggleModal=_ref.toggleModal;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cardSensitive",children:products.map(function(product){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cardSensitive__content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:product.productName,className:"cardSensitive__image",variant:"top",src:"".concat(PORT).concat(product.image)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{onClick:function onClick(){return addProductSensitivity(product);},className:"cardSensitive__button",src:add,alt:"add a yes product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cardSensitive__body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"cardSensitive__heading",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:product.brandName})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," ",product.productName," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:function onClick(){return toggleModal(product);},className:"cardSensitive__delete",src:Alert,alt:"delete this product form your Yes Sensitivity list",children:"Remove Item"})]})]},uuidv4());})});}
